creator: Pfeiffer Vacuum
descriptionHtml:
PV World is the communication platform of Pfeiffer Vacuum Technology AG.
Pfeiffer Vacuum – a name that stands for innovative vacuum and leak detection solutions, high technology and dependable products, along with first-class service.
Vacuum technology can be found everywhere in our daily life – often without us being aware of it.
Thanks to vacuum pumps, leak detectors and further vacuum equipment, using our mobile phone or wearing glasses to see better is natural to us.
Even our groceries would not have the same high quality level without vacuum technology.
Pfeiffer Vacuum offers comprehensive solutions that are vital for the production of these and many other products of our daily life.
Learn more about our Company, career opportunities at Pfeiffer Vacuum and the wide range of application fields for our products.
descriptionShort: PV World is the communication platform of Pfeiffer Vacuum Technology AG

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: • For videos with light-colored backgrounds, the appearance of the play button has been improved.

descriptionShort: PV World is the communication platform of Pfeiffer Vacuum Technology AG

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• There is a new way to create posts directly and more quickly using the Post widget.
• On-demand translation is now also available for all widgets.
• Editors can now create content in Afrikaans, Malagasy, Mongolian and Zulu.
• The latest newsfeed and News Stage widget are now available for all. This includes endless scrolling, liking and commenting from the newsfeed, and more!
• On pages, bullet points did not match the text color. This has been fixed.

descriptionShort: PV World is the communication platform of Pfeiffer Vacuum Technology AG

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• In Chat, tap and hold any of your own messages to copy or delete them.
• The Interesting Comments setting will now only notify you of direct replies to your posts and comments.
• News posts can now be enhanced with animations to highlight the content.
• Updates to Event Registration and the Advent Calendar bring new functions and an enhanced design.
• For better search usability, 5 results display per page now instead of 10.

descriptionShort: PV World is the communication platform of Pfeiffer Vacuum Technology AG

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Latvian and Thai are now available as app interface languages.
• It is now possible to edit your chat messages after sending.
• The Chat now has an improved color scheme to enhance the accessibility of the feature.
• In Chat, the experience for users using screen readers has been improved.
• Fixed: In the search function, clicking for further results redirected the user back to the main menu instead of showing more results.
• Fixed: In Chat, URLs now work again as expected.

descriptionShort: PV World is the communication platform of Pfeiffer Vacuum Technology AG

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Find what you are looking for, even on long pages: Search directly on a page and quickly pinpoint results thanks to highlighting.
• You can now choose from two new interface languages, Ukrainian and Estonian, and three new content languages, Urdu, Marshallese, and Indonesian.
• Fixed: The menu no longer crashes after being opened multiple times.
• Calendar events are now displayed in a list view to give you a better overview of events.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Find your search results faster now with the tabs for search results! Jump directly to results for content, news, users, apps, or keep browsing all relevant results.
• Several new languages are now available to you. Create and view content in Haitian Creole, Marathi, Sinhalese, Canadian French, Brazilian Portuguese, or European Portuguese and view your app interface in Japanese, Urdu, or Vietnamese.
• Fixed: In the News Stage widget, images are once again displayed properly.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• It’s more transparent now if the author of a comment or a moderator removed a comment.
• Removing a comment now only removes that specific comment. The rest of the thread stays as is.
• Fixed: Picture Galleries have a better user experience now.
• Fixed: Searching for other users now works reliably everywhere in the app.
• In the Chat, screen readers will now read notifications if there are unread messages.
